segment.source: About App-V 5.0
segment.target: About App-V 5.0

segment.source: About App-V 5.0
segment.target: About App-V 5.0

segment.source: About App-V 5.0
segment.target: About App-V 5.0

segment.source: App-V 5.0 provides an improved integrated platform, more flexible virtualization, and powerful management for virtualized applications.
segment.target: App-V 5.0 provides an improved integrated platform, more flexible virtualization, and powerful management for virtualized applications.

segment.source: For more information see the App-V 5.0 Overview (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=325265).
segment.target: For more information see the App-V 5.0 Overview (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=325265).

segment.source: What’s new?
segment.target: What’s new?

segment.source: The following list displays what is new with App-V 5.0:
segment.target: The following list displays what is new with App-V 5.0:

segment.source: IT Diagnostics and Monitoring - App-V 5.0 enhances the ability to generate reporting information about computers running the App-V 5.0 client and virtualized packages.
segment.target: IT Diagnostics and Monitoring - App-V 5.0 enhances the ability to generate reporting information about computers running the App-V 5.0 client and virtualized packages.

segment.source: End-to-End Programmability - Leveraging PowerShell 3.0, App-V 5.0 offers a complete programmability solution for packaging, client and server operations.
segment.target: End-to-End Programmability - Leveraging PowerShell 3.0, App-V 5.0 offers a complete programmability solution for packaging, client and server operations.

segment.source: Simple and Effective Client Console - App-V 5.0 offers a modern client console designed to simplify the top end user and Tier 1 support engineer scenarios.
segment.target: Simple and Effective Client Console - App-V 5.0 offers a modern client console designed to simplify the top end user and Tier 1 support engineer scenarios.

segment.source: Virtual Application Extensions - App-V 5.0 virtual application extensions enable virtual packages to run as if they are installed locally.
segment.target: Virtual Application Extensions - App-V 5.0 virtual application extensions enable virtual packages to run as if they are installed locally.

segment.source: Local Drive Creation - App-V 5.0 no longer requires a dedicated local drive letter for virtual application deployment.
segment.target: Local Drive Creation - App-V 5.0 no longer requires a dedicated local drive letter for virtual application deployment.

segment.source: Shared Content Store – The App-V 5.0 shared content store offers similar functionality to the streaming server available in previous versions of App-V.
segment.target: Shared Content Store – The App-V 5.0 shared content store offers similar functionality to the streaming server available in previous versions of App-V.

segment.source: It also requires less disk space and updates to virtual applications are available as soon as the new version is ready.
segment.target: It also requires less disk space and updates to virtual applications are available as soon as the new version is ready.

segment.source: Connection Groups - App-V 5.0 connection groups allow you to connect and run virtual applications interactively.
segment.target: Connection Groups - App-V 5.0 connection groups allow you to connect and run virtual applications interactively.

segment.source: Differences between App-V 4.6 and App-V 5.0
segment.target: Differences between App-V 4.6 and App-V 5.0

segment.source: The following table displays some of the differences between App-V 4.6 and App-V 5.0:
segment.target: The following table displays some of the differences between App-V 4.6 and App-V 5.0:

segment.source: App-V 4.6
segment.target: App-V 4.6

segment.source: App-V 5.0
segment.target: App-V 5.0

segment.source: Must Use a dedicated drive letter (Q:\).
segment.target: Must Use a dedicated drive letter (Q:\).

segment.source: No dedicated drive letter required.
segment.target: No dedicated drive letter required.

segment.source: 4 GB package size limit requirement.
segment.target: 4 GB package size limit requirement.

segment.source: No 4 GB package size limit requirement.
segment.target: No 4 GB package size limit requirement.

segment.source: Virtual applications are isolated from locally installed applications.
segment.target: Virtual applications are isolated from locally installed applications.

segment.source: Virtual applications can be extended to support local application interaction.
segment.target: Virtual applications can be extended to support local application interaction.

segment.source: Dynamic Suite Composition enabled interaction with middleware applications.
segment.target: Dynamic Suite Composition enabled interaction with middleware applications.

segment.source: Peer applications are shared using connection groups.
segment.target: Peer applications are shared using connection groups.

segment.source: For more information about connection groups see, Managing Connection Groups.
segment.target: For more information about connection groups see, Managing Connection Groups.

segment.source: VDI/RDS environments required a read-only shared cache.
segment.target: VDI/RDS environments required a read-only shared cache.

segment.source: You can update the shared content store using the standard workflow.
segment.target: You can update the shared content store using the standard workflow.

segment.source: Limited command-line scripting.
segment.target: Limited command-line scripting.

segment.source: Supports robust PowerShell scripting for the sequencer, client, and server components.
segment.target: Supports robust PowerShell scripting for the sequencer, client, and server components.

segment.source: Provides web-based management capabilities.
segment.target: Provides web-based management capabilities.

segment.source: How to Get MDOP Technologies
segment.target: How to Get MDOP Technologies

segment.source: App-V 5.0 is a part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).
segment.target: App-V 5.0 is a part of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).

segment.source: MDOP is part of Microsoft Software Assurance.
segment.target: MDOP is part of Microsoft Software Assurance.

segment.source: For more information about Microsoft Software Assurance and acquiring MDOP, see How Do I Get MDOP (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=322049).
segment.target: For more information about Microsoft Software Assurance and acquiring MDOP, see How Do I Get MDOP (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=322049).

segment.target: Got a suggestion for App-V?

segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.target: For App-V issues, use the App-V TechNet Forum.
